cursos.descripcion: Create immersive 3D games with Unity. Learn C# programming, game physics, and professional game development workflows.
cursos.prerequisitos: Basic programming knowledge in any language. Understanding of 3D geometry is helpful but not required.
cursos.resultados: Build complete 3D games, master C# programming, implement game physics, create engaging UI systems, and optimize game performance.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 24 interactive lessons, 12 hands-on projects, 4 major game development assignments, and a final capstone project.

prerequisitosList.requisit1: Basic programming knowledge in any language
prerequisitosList.requisit2: Understanding of 3D geometry is helpful but not required.

cursos.descripcion: Master the fundamentals of Unreal Engine 5. Cover Blueprint visual scripting, level design, and game optimization.
cursos.prerequisitos: No prior experience required. Basic computer skills and understanding of gaming concepts recommended.
cursos.resultados: Create basic games using Blueprints, design game levels, implement basic AI, and understand game optimization techniques.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 16 lessons, 8 practical exercises, 4 mini-projects, and a final game project.

prerequisitosList.requisit2: Basic computer skills and understanding of gaming concepts recommended.

cursos.descripcion: Learn essential game design concepts including mechanics, dynamics, aesthetics, and player psychology.
cursos.prerequisitos: No technical prerequisites. Passion for games and creative thinking required.
cursos.resultados: Design engaging game mechanics, balance gameplay, create compelling narratives, and understand player psychology.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 20 theory lessons, 10 design workshops, 5 game analysis projects, and a final game design document.

prerequisitosList.requisit2: Passion for games and creative thinking required.

cursos.descripcion: Build high-performance backend services with Node.js. Cover Express.js, MongoDB, and microservices architecture.
cursos.prerequisitos: Strong JavaScript knowledge, basic understanding of backend development and databases.
cursos.resultados: Build scalable APIs, implement authentication, handle database operations, and deploy microservices.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 28 lessons, 14 coding projects, 4 major applications, and a final system architecture project.
cursos.prerequisitosList: Strong JavaScript knowledge, basic understanding of backend development and databases.

cursos.descripcion: Comprehensive guide to database design. Learn SQL, NoSQL, data modeling, and performance optimization.
cursos.prerequisitos: Basic understanding of programming concepts and data structures.
cursos.resultados: Design efficient databases, write complex queries, optimize performance, and handle large datasets.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 20 lectures, 10 practical sessions, 5 database design projects, and a final optimization challenge.
cursos.prerequisitosList: Basic understanding of programming concepts and data structures.

cursos.descripcion: Create robust APIs using REST and GraphQL. Focus on security, documentation, and best practices.
cursos.prerequisitos: Experience with web development and basic understanding of HTTP protocols.
cursos.resultados: Design RESTful APIs, implement GraphQL, secure endpoints, and create comprehensive documentation.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 16 lessons, 8 API projects, 4 security workshops, and a final API gateway project.
cursos.prerequisitosList: Experience with web development and basic understanding of HTTP protocols.

cursos.descripcion: Advanced React concepts including hooks, context, Redux, and performance optimization techniques.
cursos.prerequisitos: Strong JavaScript knowledge and experience with React basics.
cursos.resultados: Master advanced React patterns, state management, performance optimization, and testing strategies.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 24 lessons, 12 advanced projects, 6 optimization workshops, and a final enterprise-level application.
cursos.prerequisitosList: Strong JavaScript knowledge and experience with React basics.

cursos.descripcion: Deep dive into Angular framework. Cover state management, testing, and enterprise patterns.
cursos.prerequisitos: Experience with Angular basics and TypeScript.
cursos.resultados: Implement complex state management, write comprehensive tests, and build enterprise applications.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 28 lessons, 14 projects, 7 testing workshops, and a final enterprise application.
cursos.prerequisitosList: Experience with Angular basics and TypeScript.

cursos.descripcion: Introduction to core mathematical concepts including algebra, calculus, and probability theory.
cursos.resultados: Master fundamental mathematical concepts, solve complex problems, and apply mathematical thinking.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 32 lectures, 16 problem-solving sessions, 8 assessments, and a final examination.

cursos.descripcion: Explore fundamental physics principles including mechanics, thermodynamics, and wave theory.
cursos.prerequisitos: Basic mathematics knowledge including algebra and trigonometry.
cursos.resultados: Understand core physics principles, solve physics problems, and conduct basic experiments.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 32 lectures, 16 lab sessions, 8 problem-solving workshops, and a final project.
cursos.prerequisitosList: Basic mathematics knowledge including algebra and trigonometry.

cursos.descripcion: Learn core chemistry concepts including atomic structure, chemical bonding, and reactions.
cursos.prerequisitos: Basic understanding of mathematics and scientific notation.
cursos.resultados: Master fundamental chemistry concepts, perform chemical calculations, and understand lab safety.
cursos.estructuraCurso: 32 lectures, 16 lab sessions, 8 practical assessments, and a final examination.
cursos.prerequisitosList: Basic understanding of mathematics and scientific notation.
